segments.text: I see an indoor kitchen scene, a line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's an adult woman and two children in view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, showing the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be daytime; an open window looks out onto a yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my, the single-basin sink is absolutely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet and pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle on the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands right in front of it, drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is fixed entirely on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice all this water at her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains completely neutral; she appears completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
